<h3 id="X38201">X(38201) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(7), X(8), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^3-5*(b+c)*a^2+6*(b+c)^2*a-5*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38201) = X(7)+2*X(3626) = 2*X(9)-5*X(10) = X(9)+5*X(2550) = 11*X(9)-5*X(5698) = 3*X(9)-5*X(38057) = X(9)-5*X(38200) = X(10)+2*X(2550) = 11*X(10)-2*X(5698) = 3*X(10)-2*X(38057) = 4*X(142)-X(3244) = 5*X(142)-2*X(15570) = X(390)-4*X(3634) = 11*X(2550)+X(5698) = 3*X(2550)+X(38057) = 5*X(3244)-8*X(15570) = 8*X(3826)-5*X(19862) = 4*X(3826)-X(30331) = 3*X(5698)-11*X(38057) = X(5698)-11*X(38200) = 2*X(19925)+X(35514) = X(38057)-3*X(38200)</b>
<p>X(38201) lies on these lines: {4,9}, {7,3626}, {142,3244}, {390,3634}, {496,3826}, {515,38121}, {517,38137}, {518,3919}, {519,11038}, {527,38098}, {528,38059}, {551,5853}, {758,38203}, {952,38123}, {971,38155}, {1001,16855}, {1125,8236}, {1376,38031}, {2802,38202}, {3059,3754}, {3174,30143}, {3416,4545}, {3617,4312}, {3625,5542}, {3679,5850}, {3723,3755}, {3918,5728}, {4002,14100}, {4297,9710}, {4349,16666}, {4356,16672}, {4691,5223}, {4745,5686}, {4847,27003}, {5762,38127}, {5833,37712}, {5843,38176}, {5844,38172}, {5845,38191}, {5846,38187}, {5847,38185}, {5851,38213}, {5852,24393}, {5854,38207}, {5855,38208}, {5884,15587}, {6173,34641}, {7988,20103}, {8580,9779}, {9708,28172}, {9709,10172}, {10165,31419}, {12571,31420}, {15808,20195}, {21151,28236}, {28234,38107}</p>
<p>
X(38201) = midpoint of X(2550) and X(38200)<br>
X(38201) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10, 38200), (551, 38204), (5686, 4745), (8236, 1125), (38054, 38052)<br>
X(38201) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3826, 30331, 19862), (38052, 38054, 38094)<br>
</p>
